channel.title: Just got robbed
channel.description: Just got home, I was chillen with my bro and we went biking, and there were these 3 kids. Their younger brother, threatened to kill my cousin with a bat earlier. So back on track, as we we're biking they said that we we're pussies, so my idiot brother called him a stupid fucktard (sorry for racism)Paki. They chased us, we biked as fast as we can, but these guys were fast, they were 13, 17, and 19. I ditched onto a street and hid inside some bushes while my brother kept on, with my bullshit luck they found me. They pulled me out and beat the shit out of me and stole my $1500 bike (Pro Dyno Mountain Bike). My brother came back to see what happened, they ran and threw him off my other bike that I lent my brother, they took it to their house and we called the cops. Cops came and they asked if we knew anything about them, luckily they were infront of their house, and we said we knew where they lived. They caught the 17 year old on my bike and they jumped out and cuffed him, they searched his bag and found about 10 Grams of weed and 2 bottles of Canadian Club Whisky, In the end I got my bikes back, hes arrested for 7 charges including: 2x Robbery, 2x Possession, 2x Assault and 1 for threatening me infront of the cops. While that's my story, Comment on it.

These stories are quite scary, in England we are nice peaceful people! Most of the time…

Besides, you both should of just ignored them to start with that way this entire unfortunate situation could of been avoided

EVERYONE FIGHTS, it don’t matter if you american, Mexican, or English, People fight, That’s the world, It’s impossible to find a country or even city without fights in it, Maybe YOU never seen a fight but that don’t mean there was never a fight going on.
[/quote]

I also never said there weren’t any fight at all, I said it wasn’t on that level.[/quote]

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:72, topic:406280”][quote author=Xx Weed Xx link=topic=503277.msg3684571#msg3684571 date=1311767513]

If I was in your position I’d actually kills them.[quote author=Vexillum link=topic=503277.msg3683391#msg3683391 date=1311691407]
He did do the right thing not to fight back, it was a 3 v 1… If he fought back he probably would have gotten killed. It would have been different if it was 1v1 then he could easily fight back and possibly knock the dudes teeth out. I wouldn’t have fought back if there were 3 of them with 2 of them older than me… And I’m sure some of you telling him to “Learn to fight” and fucking “learn kung fu” Are fat fucks that sit on your couch all day and code Java. Not trying to start something here… Just making a point.

Your a sensitive pussy.

You would have done nothing, I’m not sensitive… If he would have fought back in a 3 v 1 he would have gotten killed.
[/quote]

You don’t know me, How would you know that I wouldn’t fight back… You don’t. Looking at your comment you sound like a completely pussy hole that would get beaten up by a granny.
[/quote]
Looking at your comment you seem like the type that runs their mouth a lot. All mouth, no action.[/quote]

Once again, you don’t know me IRL.

Not trying to start something here… Just making a point.
